content_data.question: How long does shipping take?
content_data.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 business days) and overnight shipping are available at checkout. Orders placed before 2 PM EST ship same day.

content_data.question: Do you offer free shipping?
content_data.answer: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50. Sign up for our newsletter to get exclusive free shipping offers.

content_data.question: Do you ship internationally?
content_data.answer: Currently we ship to the United States and Canada. We're working on expanding to more countries. Sign up for updates!

content_data.question: What is your return policy?
content_data.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase for unopened items in original packaging. Opened products can be exchanged if defective. Contact us at support@bakalr.com to initiate a return.

content_data.question: What if my order arrives damaged?
content_data.answer: Please contact us within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damage. We'll send a replacement or issue a full refund. Your satisfaction is our priority!

content_data.question: What payment methods do you accept?
content_data.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay. Affirm is available for orders over $50.

content_data.question: How can I track my order?
content_data.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also track your order by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

content_data.question: Are all your products authentic?
content_data.answer: Absolutely! We only source products directly from authorized distributors and manufacturers. Every product we sell is 100% authentic with a satisfaction guarantee.

content_data.question: How do I know which products are right for my hair type?
content_data.answer: Each product page includes recommendations for specific hair types. You can also use our Hair Quiz (coming soon!) or contact our customer service team for personalized recommendations.

content_data.question: Do you offer wholesale pricing for salons?
content_data.answer: Yes! We have a professional program for licensed cosmetologists and salon owners. Contact wholesale@bakalr.com with your license number for more information.
